title: (x) 'Jakki Degg': wide sans - Eurostile {J Bradley J}
content:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone know this font?

The font at the bottom of the page

hope you can help =)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023080926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/issue158cover_4567.jpg)
author: Michael Palmer

comments.content:
Hmmm ... what am I looking at here again?  
oh yeah, a font. Could be [Eurostile Bold Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023080926/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=4342033)
The magazine logo started out as [City](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023080926/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/city-be/).
emmm sorry, what? i got a little distracted there
